definition: a thin varnish made by dissolving lac in ethanol, cover with a thin varnish made from dissolving lac in ethanol
details:
noun
- a thin varnish made by dissolving lac in ethanol
= synonyms: shellac varnish
- lac purified by heating and filtering
verb
- cover with a thin varnish made from dissolving lac in ethanol
= example: cover with a thin varnish made from dissolving lac in ethanol
= synonyms: shellack
